resources.string: Quiz - What car will you drive?
\"The cars we drive, say a lot about us.\"
What kind of driver are you?
Driving is just a way to get from point A to point B, as far as you"'re" concerned. Might as well enjoy the ride while you"'"re at it.
You buckle your seat belt before you even get out your keys, and you always do the speed limit. You won"'"t let these flying metal death traps get the best of you, no way.
You know the little handle above the window? People grip that extra tight when they"'"re riding with you. You"'"ve never met a fast lane you didn"'"t like.
Most drivers fall into the categories of "too aggressive" or "not aggressive enough". You, on the other hand, have struck the perfect balance. You"'"re the type of driver we wish everyone could be.
You should definitely buy petrol engine car!
You should definitely buy diesel engine car!
Try again to improve your score!
Pretty good, but you can do better!
This is the car you should buy!
What kind of driver are you?
If you could drive and put your feet up on the dashboard, you would. For you, driving isn\'t how fast you get to a destination, it\'s about the journey and vibing with the open road.

Everybody seems to drive faster than you, and this makes you really angry. Especially when you have difficulties to see the road ahead. Sometimes you stay in the fast lane just to annoy others. Parking is a mystery.

You\'re young, but you know how to get things done. You\'re a driving expert and your love of speed never puts others in danger. One might say you\'re the perfect driver. Most likely, you avoided several crashes at the last moment. Because you\'re too good, that\'s why.

You drive too fast for your own good. Bouts of fury are not uncommon, and others think you\'re a real jerk. But at the same time you love cars and know how to have a lot of fun while driving. Your passengers, not so much.

You drive like a maniac always knowing what to do in extreme situations. You often disregard rules and regulations, but this is how you think you\'ll get from A to B in the fastest and safest way. You\'ll die still thinking this.
You have succesfully completed the challenge!

string-array.name: listaNaslova
string-array.item: What kind of driver are you?
